name: Bandit The Bee Level 2: Andy The Ant
name_original: Bandit The Bee Level 2: Andy The Ant
description:
University of Tulsa CSG 1003 GDC 03 C: Bandit The Bee Level 2: Andy The Ant

Help Andy The Ant protect the  queen ants from incoming bees!

Music: "Tabletops" by LJ Kotnik

Game instructions:

Objective: Keep bees from reaching your queen ants... kill 20 bees to win

Rotate/Aim Andy using arrows keys

Shoot using the spacebar

To activate music, click once on the screen
